_description: Phrases describing the sound of angel’s voice prophesying to Elias of the coming of Christ, in a Latin sermon, ‘De corpore Cristi…’ — four monorhyming lines

CULIi38.Transcription:
ase a gost schewyngass a wynd wyrlyngase a feyr
                    brennynggand ase a wynd wistlyngg
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 10.
